#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Appreciate the Uniqueness in You
#Text=Dear friends , the world will say ' No ! ' in a thousand ways .
#Text=Each No ! you hear has the potential to erode your confidence bit by bit until you quit all together .
#Text=You have to continue to do what you are doing , if you are certain you are doing the right thing .
#Text=Self esteem and self confidence are the key stones to success and happiness .
#Text=Here are some steps you must follow and internalize if you wish to raise your self worth and confidence level .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Stop comparing yourself with other people , Say and think good about yourself .
#Text=Everyone makes mistakes , but it is how you react to them that makes a difference .
#Text=Do n't beat yourself up over a slip up ; forgive yourself , laugh it off , and learn from it .
#Text=Associate with similar people .
#Text=It is said that you are that he average of five of your closest friends .
#Text=Try to surround yourself only with positive people who reflect your values and that you can learn from .
#Text=Keep people near you who will encourage , motivate , and accept you as you are .
#Text=Do not keep " vanity friends . "
#Text=Those are the people who pose as your friends but pull you down at the earliest opportunity .
#Text=Having them may make you seen popular , but they are useless as actual friends .
#Text=Make a list of your positive qualities .
#Text=It 's okay to start with a few and add more each day .
#Text=List out what you love about yourself and the qualities you want to have ; work towards fostering those qualities every day .
#Text=You could also write down your short-term to help motivate you to reach them
#Text=Start doing some exercise every day .
#Text=By doing this , you will feel better .
#Text=Exercising releases endorphins which will lessen your stress .
#Text=By exercising , your helping your body keep your hormones and feelings at the appropriate level .
#Text=Help others reach your level .
#Text=Yes , you are unique , and that deserves appreciation .
#Text=Other people are unique and need appreciation as well .
#Text=They may not think they deserve it or may not know how to accept themselves .
#Text=Help them by building them up as you do yourself .
#Text=Be generous with compliments .
#Text=Thank others when they help you , and give them credit when they deserve it .
#Text=Praise yourself but not at the expense of others .
#Text=Instead of putting people down to make you seem better , praise everyone 's achievements with your own .
#Text=When the team wins , you do n't say " I did it . "
#Text=Instead , you say " we did it . "
#Text=By praising everyone ( while including yourself ) , you help everyone and create a personal , friendly bond with them .
#Text=Sometimes , just smiling at someone can give their self-esteem a boost .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Do not confuse high self esteem and confidence with arrogance and ego .
#Text=While the former makes people happy and lets them believe they are good as anyone else , the second makes them believe they , and only they , are the best .
